about_the_game:
Take over a run-down, abandoned venue and transform it into the most popular nightclub in the country. In this adventure, players will renovate, upgrade, and expand every corner of the space to reach the pinnacle of nightlife. But it won't be easy; you'll need to manage troublesome customers while also maintaining the club's reputation. This game isn't just a nightclub simulator; it's a journey of strategy, creativity, and chaos that you’ll experience together with your friends.

From venue design to customer relationships, we provide a dynamic atmosphere that immerses you in the chaos and excitement of nightlife. Create your own club’s style and atmosphere, customize your venue, and leave your mark on the nightlife scene. Whether you want to deck out your club with a modern design or add a touch of nostalgia, the choice is entirely yours!


The best graphics in the co-op simulation genre you'll ever play. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.




Dynamic customer AI behaviors and spontaneous events for a more immersive experience.



Boost the club’s prestige and customer satisfaction by adding features like a stripper, condom machines, and other premium amenities.



Manage who gets in and collect entrance fees to maintain control and maximize profits at the door.



Take your nightclub to the next level with your friends and become the best in town!

Take over a run-down, abandoned venue and transform it into the most popular nightclub in the country. In this adventure, players will renovate, upgrade, and expand every corner of the space to reach the pinnacle of nightlife. But it won't be easy; you'll need to manage troublesome customers while also maintaining the club's reputation. This game isn't just a nightclub simulator; it's a journey of strategy, creativity, and chaos that you’ll experience together with your friends.

From venue design to customer relationships, we provide a dynamic atmosphere that immerses you in the chaos and excitement of nightlife. Create your own club’s style and atmosphere, customize your venue, and leave your mark on the nightlife scene. Whether you want to deck out your club with a modern design or add a touch of nostalgia, the choice is entirely yours!


The best graphics in the co-op simulation genre you'll ever play. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.




Dynamic customer AI behaviors and spontaneous events for a more immersive experience.



Boost the club’s prestige and customer satisfaction by adding features like a stripper, condom machines, and other premium amenities.



Manage who gets in and collect entrance fees to maintain control and maximize profits at the door.



Take your nightclub to the next level with your friends and become the best in town!
name: Night Club Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660S 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: Purchase an abandoned, run-down venue and transform it into the best nightclub in the country. Renovate, upgrade, and expand the space while dealing with troublesome customers. Work together with your friends to reach the pinnacle of nightlife!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech
*languages with full audio support
